code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CartCard(_ref){var product=_ref.product,removeFromCart=_ref.removeFromCart;var title=product.title,price=product.price,image=product.image,id=product.id;function handleClick(){removeFromCart(id);}var cardStyle={width:'40%',padding:'10px'};var imgDiv={width:'20%',float:'left'};var imgStyle={overflow:'hidden',objectFit:'cover',height:'80px',width:'80px'};var cardText={float:'left',width:'60%',paddingTop:'7%',textAlign:'left',paddingLeft:'5px'};var buttonCol={paddingTop:'5%'};var buttonStyle={width:'10%'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:cardStyle,className:"ui raised segment",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"column",style:imgDiv,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,className:"ui tiny image",style:imgStyle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"column",style:cardText,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{children:[title," \xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0\xA0 $",price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"column",style:buttonCol,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ui tiny button",onClick:handleClick,style:buttonStyle,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"close icon"})})})]})});}export default CartCard;
